content: a classic design boasts a modern outlook on this gorgeous crochet blanket that s perfect for warmth when the temperature drops featuring the iconic granny square pattern is worked in the round and flat using double_crochet stitches and seaming techniques rich shades of patons inspired bring life to the dynamic mitered granny squares constructed of individual motifs that are later sewn together this is a great on-the-go project for keeping hands busy yarns for model patons® inspired™ 5 3 oz/150 g 222 yds/203 m main color mc soft cream 92001 4 balls or 696 yds/636 m contrast a silver gray heather 092007 2 balls or 379 yds/347 m contrast b honey spice 92036 2 balls or 354 yds/324 m contrast c violet 92012 2 balls or 351 yds/321 m contrast d purple gray 92010 2 balls or 370 yds/338 m
